headline: Why the Narrative Around Northern Trust Is Shifting Amid Growth and Merger Speculation
summary: Northern Trust stock’s consensus analyst price target saw only a modest uptick, inching from $124.25 to $126.38. This subtle change reflects shifting views in light of strong asset growth, market-driven gains, and ongoing debates around future upside. Read on to see how recent developments could influence the evolving story for Northern Trust and what to watch for as the narrative continues to change.
